QUESTION: Will all wells in the well bay and related production equipment be shut-in when moving on to or off of an offshore platform, or from well to well on the platform? If not, please explain.
Has approval been obtained to commingle sands for this completion? If yes, then comment.
Will the completed interval be within 500 feet of a block line? If yes, then comment.
For permanent abandonment, will casings be cut 15 feet below the mudline? If no, then comment.
Is H2S present in the well? If yes, then comment on the inclusion of a Contingency Plan for this operation.
Is this proposed operation the only lease holding activity for the subject lease? If yes, then comment.
